This project has been completed. The proposal is kept here both to celebrate the achievements of the Monero community, and for historical accuracy about what was accomplished.

Additional GUI Developer

by Jaquee

November 22, 2016

What

Additional GUI developer.

Who

Iâm Jaquee. I have 10+ yrs experience of various kinds of coding. Iâm new to the crypto world. Have only been around for a couple of months and i like what i see. Iâve been contributing to Monero for about a month now and this is what iâve come up with so far:

https://github.com/monero-project/monero-core/commits/master?author=Jaqueeee

https://github.com/monero-project/monero/commits/master?author=jaqueeee

Why

I love the fundamentals of Monero and want to get more involved in the community. I believe an official GUI will help Monero go mainstream. Ilya has done a terrific job so far, but his time is limited and Iâm happy to help out. The public beta is soon to be released but a lot of features such as daemon integration (start/stop), better remote node support, ux improvements, porting to smartphones, third party plugin system etc. are not finished yet.

The Proposal and Milestones

Hourly pay: 4.5 xmr (~$25)

10-20 hours per week over 6 months. ~550 hours

Total: 2475 XMR

Milestones: Iâll write reports every 50 hours and will be working on the missing features and future requests from community.

Payments: 11 payments of 225 XMR, one for each 50 hour milestone (paid in XMR)

Expiration

9 months

Edit: Changed xml.to integration in examples -> third party plugin system.
